channel.title: Party recruitment
channel.description:
Hey guys, I want to set up a party/group of players (PS3) to play multiplayer/co-op games with.
Games required: (if you have any of the following games and are interested, post your psn below)
- Resident evil 5 or 6 - Grand theft auto 4 or 5 - call of duty series (preferrably MW1-3/BO1/2) - Battlefield 3/4 - Dead Island
these games at the top of my head.
If there's another game you'd like to play (and if I have it), I'll add it to the list. If you have any questions, PM me or post here, who gives a shit.
Begin.

item.title: Party recruitment
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:17, topic:548402”]My KD on BO2 is like 1.56 and AW is like 1.03
Rarely play AW though xD[/quote]
Yea I’m not a fan of AW. It loads horrendously, very glitchy with movement, and just a poor feel overall.

Read full topic

item.title: Party recruitment
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“naseem142, post:9, topic:548402”][quote author=Lil_Smok3r link=topic=667308.msg4462828#msg4462828 date=1418497164]

got black ops 2 on ps3 only… Anybody wanna play tomorrow at 5:00 PM EET?

my psn is NexusNova

[size=1pt]fk u idc if its a g@y name [/size]

Haha, I have most CoD’s, I’ll add you and we can play BO2; one question: K/D?

I don’t really pay attention to my K/D, and i also have ghosts and advanced warfare which i don’t play alot cuz i dont like it.
So when can you play?

I have AW too; it’s really fun. I can play whenever, just message me on skype
Skype: Lil_Smok3r
[/quote]

which one are you? I see three Lil_Smok3rs[/quote]
the UK one

Read full topic
